-- 1000 | 0000 | 1000 | 0010		frosty the
-- 1000 | 1000 | 0000 | 1010		snowman was a
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1000		jolly happy
-- 1000 | 0000 | 0000 | 1010		soul with a
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1010		corn cob pipe and a
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1010		button nose and two
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1000		eyes made out of
-- 1000 | 0000 | 0000 | 0000		coal
-- 1000 | 0000 | 1000 | 0010		frosty the
-- 1000 | 1000 | 0000 | 1010		snowman is a
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1000		fairytale they 
-- 1000 | 0000 | 0000 | 1010		say. he was 
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1010		made of snow but the
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1010		children know how he
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1000		came to life one
-- 1000 | 0000 | 0000 | 1000		day. There
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1000		must have been some
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1000		magic in that
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1000		old silk hat they
-- 1000 | 0000 | 0000 | 1000		found. For
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1000		when they placed it
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1010		on his head he be-
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1000		gan to dance a-
-- 1000 | 0000 | 1000 | 0000		round. Oh,
-- 1000 | 0000 | 1000 | 0010		Frosty the 
-- 1000 | 1000 | 0000 | 1010		snowman was a-
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1000		live as he could
-- 1000 | 0000 | 0000 | 1010		be and the 
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1010		children say he could
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1010		laugh and play just the
-- 1000 | 1000 | 1000 | 1000		same as you and 
-- 1000 | 0000 | 0000 | 0000		me
